participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Active and determined, Emily enjoys the outdoors and has a competitive spirit.
participant_1.background: my family is continuously growing. i enjoy long walks with my dog. i'm a professional tennis player. i live in a three storey house.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Reflective and hopeful, Jordan is eager to turn a new page in his life.
participant_2.background: i will be released in about a month. i am currently in a juvenile detention center. i feel old. my mom is coming to visit me tomorrow.
